0.info: Return a non-Gold, non-Relentless unit on your side to your hand, then remove from the game.
0.name: Decoy

1.info: Double the strength of all non-Gold units on a row on your side, then remove from the game.
1.name: Commander's Horn

10.info: Convert all instances of a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield to Gold until destroyed or the round ends.
10.name: Promote

1000.info: Remove 5 strength from an opposing unit.
1000.name: Vernon Roche

10000.info: Choose a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield. Spawn an exact copy on the same row.
10000.name: Foltest

1001.info: Add 3 strength to 3 non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
1001.name: John Natalis

1003.info: Convert all other Gold units to Silver (or Bronze, if that was their original color). Gain 1 strength for each unit converted.
1003.name: Dijkstra

1006.info: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit and convert it to Gold until destroyed or the round ends.
1006.name: Shani

1031.info: Play a Blue Stripes Commando from your deck whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
1031.name: Ves

1043.info: Move to a random row on your side at the start of your turn and add 1 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
1043.name: Odrin

11.info: Spawn a base copy of the last non-Gold Special Card played, then remove from the game.
11.name: Nature's Gift

1106.info: Spawn an exact copy of this unit on the same row.
1106.name: Poor Infantry

1108.info: Choose a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield. Play an instance of it from your deck.
1108.name: Reaver Scout

1111.info: If 3 or more Redanian Elites are on your side of the battlefield, convert them to Gold until destroyed or the round ends.

1112.info: Add 3 strength to 2 non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
1112.name: Kaedweni Siege Support

1114.info: Add 4 strength a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield.
1114.name: Blue Stripes Scout

1115.info: Add 2 strength to all your other Blue Stripes Commandos, wherever they are.
1115.name: Blue Stripes Commando

1116.info: Resurrect a random non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit.
1116.name: Field Medic

1118.info: After 2 turns, convert to Gold until destroyed or the round ends.
1118.name: Dun Banner Heavy Cavalry

12.info: Destroy the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.
12.name: Epidemic

2.info: Destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.

3000.info: Remove 1 strength from all opposing non-Gold units. Add 1 strength to all non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.

30001.info: Return a non-Relentless unit on your side to your hand and immediately play it again.
30001.name: Eithné

30002.info: Play a Silver card from your deck.
30002.name: Brouver Hoog

3006.info: Resurrect a non-Gold Special Card from either graveyard.
3006.name: Aglaïs

3032.info: Remove 2 strength from all other non-Gold units on the row. Draw a card.

3034.info: Spawn a Commando Neophyte on a random row whenever the strength of this Vrihedd Dragoon changes without it being destroyed.

3037.name: Morenn

3100.info: Add 3 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
3100.name: Hawker Healer

3103.info: Add 1 strength to the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on your side of the battlefield (except self), remove 1 strength from the weakest opposing non-Gold unit(s).
3103.name: Vrihedd Officer

3104.info: Ambush: When a revealed non-Gold unit appears on the row, remove 5 strength from all non-Gold units on the row (except self).

3106.info: Gain 2 strength for each Dwarf unit on your side of the battlefield.

3108.info: Immune to Frost. Add 3 strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield. If it's a Dwarf, add {add2} strength instead.

3109.name: Elven Mercenary

3110.info: Spawn a Commando Neophyte on a random row.

3116.info: Return a Bronze unit on your side (other than a Blue Mountain Commando) to your hand and immediately play it again.
3116.name: Blue Mountain Commando

4.name: Impenetrable Fog

4002.info: Immune to Frost. Remove 3 strength from an opposing unit and 1 strength from all other units on its row.

4003.info: Immune to Fog. Spawn a Fog effect and 3 Rabid Wolves.

4004.info: Immune to Frost. Spawn a Frost effect and 2 Wild Hunt Hounds.

4040.name: Crone: Weavess

4042.info: Discard a non-Gold unit and absorb its strength, then draw a card.

4051.info: Immune to Frost. Remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a Wild Hunt unit appears on your side.
4051.name: Nithral

4100.info: Immune to Fog. Play from your deck or graveyard and gain 1 strength whenever Fog is spawned. Destroy when moved outside of Fog or Fog is removed.

4110.info: Move a non-Gold card from your opponent's graveyard to your own.

50002.info: Remove 3 strength from all weakened opposing units and 2 strength from all other opposing units.

5001.info: When moved to the graveyard, convert to Silver.

50022.info: Resurrect at the start of the round and lose 2 base strength.

5003.info: After 3 turns, spawn Hemdall on this unit's side and destroy all Kambis on this side.

50037.info: Keep a non-Gold unit on the battlefield at the end of this round.

50038.info: Add 8 strength to a non-Gold unit. If it's a Witcher, add {add2} strength instead.

50050.info: Convert all units on one of your rows to Gold until destroyed or the round ends.

50051.info: Set the strength of all other non-Gold units on the row to 1.

50054.info: When destroyed, remove 4 strength from all non-Gold units on its side.

50057.info: Destroy the weakest non-Gold unit(s) twice in a row.

50058.info: Spawn a Ban Ard Adept whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
50058.name: Margarita Laux–Antille

50059.info: Convert a Gold unit to Silver (or Bronze, if that was its original color).
50059.name: Kaedweni Sergeant

50060.info: Remove 2 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
50060.name: Ballista

50063.info: Gain 2 strength whenever a Gold card appears on your side.

50064.info: Add 1 strength to all your other Reaver Hunters, wherever they are. After 2 turns, play a Reaver Hunter from your deck.

50075.info: Destroy all non-Gold units with 3 strength or lower.

50106.info: Remove 6 strength from an opposing unit.
